Online video maker for social media and business
Create professional-looking videos for social marketing, training, and education. Start with our highly customizable video templates!
Instantly remove background noise from your video to ensure your content is free from audible distractions. Create crystal-clear audio for your audience.
No need for green screens! Now, you can automatically remove your video’s background. Replace it with a solid color, an image, or even another video.
Perfectly polish your videos by removing unwanted silences, awkward pauses, or filler words (like “er” or “um”) in just a few seconds.

Translate subtitles, audio, and more

Get startedFAQVEED combines text-based editing, automatic edits, and AI video generation in one online video editor. Edit a video by editing the transcript, and cut clips as easily as deleting text. Upload footage and let Auto Edits add subtitles, clean audio, and insert B-roll. Or generate complete videos from text prompts using AI.
Unlike other editors that specialize in one thing, VEED offers the complete workflow: create, edit, enhance, and export. No need to juggle multiple platforms or navigate complex software like Adobe Premiere.VEED is the best free online video editor for businesses and creators. Unlike desktop software requiring downloads and steep learning curves, VEED is an intuitive, browser-based editor. While Adobe Express requires navigating complex interfaces and DaVinci Resolve needs technical expertise, VEED offers professional features with intuitive drag-and-drop editing. Free exports include a watermark.
